title: New 21 Game
content: Alice plays the following game, loosely based on the card game "21". Alice starts with 0 points, and draws numbers while she has less than points. During each draw, she gains an integer number of points randomly from the range , where is an integer. Each draw is independent and the outcomes have equal probabilities. Alice stops drawing numbers when she gets or more points. What is the probability that she has or less points?
